edu.ou.asgbook.motion.Differencer

edu.ou.asgbook.motion.Differencer Class Reference

Just computes a pixel-by-pixel difference. More...

LatLonGrid compute (LatLonGrid data0, LatLonGrid data1)

Static Public Member Functions

static void main (String[] args) throws Exception

Detailed Description

Just computes a pixel-by-pixel difference.

This is really not a motion estimation, but is there just to show what happens when you do so.

Author:
v.lakshmanan

Member Function Documentation

LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.motion.Differencer.compute ( LatLonGrid  data0,
LatLonGrid  data1 
) 

00026                                                                  {
00027         LatLonGrid result = LatLonGrid.copyOf(data1);
00028         for (int i=0; i < result.getNumLat(); ++i){
00029             for (int j=0; j < result.getNumLon(); ++j){
00030                 int diff = data1.getValue(i,j) - data0.getValue(i,j);
00031                 result.setValue(i,j, diff);
00032             }
00033         }
00034         return result;
00035     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.motion.Differencer.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00037                                                             {
00038         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("difference");
00039         
00040         // seviri
00041         File f = new File("data/seviri");
00042         Pair<LatLonGrid,Date>[] grids = SeviriInfraredTemperature.readAll(f);
00043         KmlWriter.write(grids[0].first, out, "ir0", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00044         KmlWriter.write(grids[1].first, out, "ir1", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00045         LatLonGrid diff = new Differencer().compute(grids[0].first, grids[1].first);
00046         KmlWriter.write(diff, out, "irdiff", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00047         
00048         // popdensity
00049         DataTransform[] transforms = {new GlobalPopulation.LinearScaling(), new GlobalPopulation.LogScaling()};
00050         String[] prefix = {"popdensity", "logpopdensity"};
00051         for (int i=0; i < transforms.length; ++i){
00052             LatLonGrid popdensity0 = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA1990, transforms[i]).crop(900, 2500, 200, 200);
00053             LatLonGrid popdensity1 = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA, transforms[i]).crop(900, 2500, 200, 200);
00054             KmlWriter.write(popdensity0, out, prefix[i]+"0", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00055             KmlWriter.write(popdensity0, out, prefix[i]+"1", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00056             diff = new Differencer().compute(popdensity0, popdensity1);
00057             KmlWriter.write(diff, out, prefix[i]+"diff", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00058         }
00059     }
